document.full_text: pernod ricard sa  the world's no. 2 spirits maker, lost a u.s. appeals court ruling on tuesday over the right to use the name "havana club" on rum sold in the u.s. market.
document.title: pernod loses havana club appeal in fight with bacardi
lines_and_colors: pernod ricard sa  the world's no. 2 spirits maker, lost a u.s. appeals court ruling on tuesday over the right to use the name "havana club" on rum sold in the u.s. market.
